[[File:Image oedema.png|vignette|Œdema of the lower limbs with bucket]]

question.title: What is the term for the appearance of oedema due to fluid retention in the lower limbs?

option_a.title: Bucket sign
option_a.description: A visible swelling of the lower limbs due to fluid retention

option_b.title: Pitting edema
option_b.description: A type of edema characterized by the formation of small, fluid-filled blisters on the skin

option_c.title: Pulmonary edema
option_c.description: A condition characterized by excess fluid accumulation in the lungs

option_d.title: Oedema of the upper limbs
option_d.description: A condition characterized by swelling of the upper limbs due to fluid retention

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: The letter of the correct option
